title: Cleric
content: NT SPHERE Lv 4 Evocation Action Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force, reducing its movement speed by half, and blocking all incoming and outgoing damage. 3 TurnsThe target can't be Huge in size. 9m DEX SaveConcentration POLYMORPH Lv 4 Transmutation Action Transform a creature into a harmless sheep. 5 Turns 18m WIS SaveConcentration STONESKIN Lv 4 Abjuration Action Turn a creature's flesh hard as stone. It takes only half the damage of all non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing. and Slashi
